alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 1:28AM MST until February 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph above 10000 feet. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snow packed road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
